input.description: String Value - The ID of the change to be updated.
String Value. The ID of the task associated to the Change.

String Value - The new Status value to be updated.
Valid Values for BMC_AR_System:
New In Progress Completed Cancelled

String Value - the status resson to be updated.
Valid Values for BMC_AR_System:
Success Failed To Be Re-Scheduled
String Value - Text string to store in workinfo summary of the Change ticket.

String Value - requested start date of the Change ticket.
Remedy Example: 1262304060 (epoch)

String Value - requested end date of the Change ticket.
Remedy Example: 1262304060 (epoch)
String Value - additional notes to be added to the Change Ticket.

The Impact of the Change Ticket.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
1-Extensive/Widespread 2-Significant/Large 3-Moderate/Limited 4-Minor/Localized

The Urgency of the Change Ticket.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
1-Critical 2-High 3-Medium 4-Low

The Class of the Change Ticket.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
Emergency Expedited Latent Normal No Impact Standard

The Reason of the Change Class specified in the Change Ticket.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
Customer/business need Insufficient lead-time Known error correction Scheduling conflict

The Environment of the Change.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
Production Model Office Hot Backup Development

The reason for which this Change Ticket was created.
Valid Values for BMC Remedy:
Fix/Repair New Functionality Maintenance Upgrade Other
Commoa separated list of the associated CI's names.
Comma separated list of the associated CI's Recon IDs.

=> Only applicable for Remedy.
Maps to SourceID.
Usually name of the host server.
ID of the Job represented in source EM.
Version of the job as represented in source EM.
Instance ID of the job for which this process has been invoked.
Job name of the job for which this process has been invoked.
Description of the job for which this process has been invoked.
The type of the job for which this process has been invoked.

input.value: Error in fetching the TaskID corressponing to

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(., '&')"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(., 'webService=', '${interface}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="concat(., '&webService=', '${interface}')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:urn="CHG_ChangeServiceInterface" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="Change_ProcessInterfaceData " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soapenv:Envelope> <soapenv:Header> <xsl:element name="urn:AuthenticationInfo"> <xsl:element name="urn:userName">$[username]</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:password">${password}</xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <xsl:element name="urn:Change_ProcessInterfaceData"> <xsl:element name="urn:InfrastructureChangeID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:TaskID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${TaskID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:SourceID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${host}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobid}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobVersion"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${JobVersion}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobType"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobType}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobName"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobName}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobDetailedDescription"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${jobDetailedDescription}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CIReconIDList"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ciids}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CINameList"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ci_names}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:AdditionalNotes"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${AdditionalNotes}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Urgency"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${urgency}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Impact"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${impact}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeClass"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${requestType}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeClassReason"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeClassReason}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ReasonForChange"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ReasonForChange}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:LocationCompany"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${LocationCompany}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:StartDate"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${startdate}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:EndDate"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${enddate}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character01"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character01}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character02"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character02}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character03"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character03}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character04"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character04}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character05"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character05}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character06"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character06}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character07"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character07}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character08"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character08}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character09"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character09}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Character10"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Character10}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeEnvironment"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeEnvironment}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeWorkInfoNotes"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ChangeWorkInfoNotes}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier2"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier2}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier1}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:CategorizationTier3"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${CategorizationTier3}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier1}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier2"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier2}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductCatTier3"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductCatTier3}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductName"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductName}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ProductModelVersion"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${ProductModelVersion}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Manufacturer"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Manufacturer}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:Status"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${Status}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:StatusReason"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${StatusReason}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:VendorAssigneeGroups"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${VendorGroup}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:JobInstanceID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${JobInstanceID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Going to call web service update for update.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="yes" /><xsl:template match="/"><result><xsl:for-each select="//*"><xsl:choose><xsl:when test="contains(name(.), "ReturnMessage")"><xsl:copy-of select="." /></xsl:when></xsl:choose></xsl:for-each></result></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"><xsl:output indent="no" /><xsl:template match="/"><text> <xsl:for-each select="/*/*"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <response-data> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${failure count}' = 0"> <status-message> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${consolidated message}')>0">${consolidated message}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Change Request updated successfully.</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </status-message> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <error-message>$[consolidated message]</error-message> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </response-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length('${error code}')>0">${error}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${error message}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Failed to Update the change ticket.

documentation.description: Calls the Appropriate OA update operation depending on the input parameters.
